name: UNROOTED Good Energy Shot (12 Pack, Mighty Ginger) - Immune System and Natural Energy Booster - 12 x 60ml Bottles - Ginger, Turmeric, Chilli & Baobab
short_description: BOOSTED WITH BAOBAB, HIGH IN FIBER - Baobab powder is naturally high in fiber (over 50%!) and is the perfect ingredient to help sustain energy levels for hours rather than minutes (meaning no spikes and crashes – and certainly no caffeine jitters). Fiber also does wonders for your gut health, supporting everything from your immune system & overall wellbeing to your digestion.
VITAMINS & ANTIOXIDANTS - Containing more than 5x the vitamin C of oranges and 2x more antioxidants than açai, Baobab packs a punch alongside a long list of other micronutrients and amino acids.

WILD HARVESTED – Baobab can only be wild harvested, as it takes up to 200 years for the tree to grow before it can produce fruits! All baobab fruit powder is naturally organic and one of the most nutrient-dense superfoods around. It has been relied upon as a natural energy source and gut health booster across Africa for thousands of years.

SUSTAINABILITY - UNROOTED’s Baobab fruit is sustainably sourced from Zimbabwe. It is 100% organic, and sales of baobab fruit help support children’s education programs in Zimbabwe and environmental projects in South Africa via the Baobab Foundation.

OUR FOUNDER - Our founder grew up in South Africa and witnessed the power of this African superfruit for himself on a trip to Kenya in early 2018. Since then, he has been on a mission to bring baobab to the world!

short_description: 𝟭𝟬𝟬% 𝗡𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗔𝗟, 𝗖𝗢𝗟𝗗-𝗣𝗥𝗘𝗦𝗦𝗘𝗗 𝗪𝗘𝗟𝗟𝗡𝗘𝗦𝗦 𝗦𝗛𝗢𝗧𝗦:Fighter Shots are made to support your immune system and boost your energy levels. The perfect wake up call to give the body a boost or use as a more mellow medicinal approach with some added hot water. Fighter Shots have a range of shots for everyone, so don’t miss yours!

𝗚𝗜𝗡𝗚𝗘𝗥 + 𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗠𝗘𝗥𝗜𝗖 𝗦𝗛𝗢𝗧𝗦: Turmeric is a powerful antioxidant that has been used for centuries in Asia and has been famed for its versatility in alternative medicine. It has some amazing health benefits and is the perfect shot for health-conscious consumers looking for a supplement that lowers the chance of illness and reduces pain the natural way.

𝟴𝗚 𝗢𝗙 𝗥𝗔𝗪 𝗢𝗥𝗚𝗔𝗡𝗜𝗖 𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗠𝗘𝗥𝗜𝗖: 13g of raw organic ginger is combined with 8g of raw organic turmeric, cold-pressed to extract 5g of turmeric juice, producing 150mg of turmeric’s active ingredient, curcumin - which is your recommended daily dose! Taking turmeric as part of a daily balanced diet can be associated with a multitude of healh benefits.

𝗪𝗛𝗬 𝗙𝗜𝗚𝗛𝗧𝗘𝗥 𝗦𝗛𝗢𝗧𝗦? Fighter Shots contain organic cold-pressed ginger along with honey and lemon, which are known for their antiseptic properties, and lots of Vitamin C. 𝗢𝗨𝗥 𝗦𝗧𝗢𝗥𝗬: In 2019 our founder, Anna, first tried ginger drinks while overseas. She was so impressed by how much better she felt, she started on a mission: to create a great tasting ginger shot-in-a-bottle. Several months of intense research later, Fighter Shots was born. Using Anna’s blend of only the very best natural ingredients, bottled in recyclable glass, these invigorating shots are a convenient way to pack in indispensable nutrients.
